{{DISPLAYTITLE:Polyobj_Move}} {{special|4|po, speed, angle, dist|Polyobject|Move}}
Moves a polyobject.
* ''po'': polyobj to move * ''speed'': how quickly the polyobj should move * ''angle'': direction the polyobj should move (this is a [[Definitions#Byte_Angles|byte angle]]) * ''dist'': distance to move
==Examples== *[http://www.mediafire.com/download/bvmrclltwc9clrk/poly-move.WAD Example map : moving a polyobject in 4 directions ] *[https://www.mediafire.com/file/2h247amuhh9l5n5/PolyMOVE_2.wad Example map : open a 2 part door ]
